channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 阿尔特里亚集团计划出售其在 Anheuser-Busch InBev 公司所持的 20 亿美元股份，以将更多现金返还给股东。
item.description:
Altria Group plans to sell more $2 billion of its stake in Anheuser-Busch InBev as it looks to return more cash to shareholders https://t.co/gb2C3r9IQG https://t.co/gb2C3r9IQG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州的一对夫妇聘请设计师莉尔丝-麦肯纳（Lilse McKenna）将家中使用率不高的屏风门廊改造成真正的生活空间，他们的设计理念很明确：一个超级实用、全年开放的家庭室，同时又不牺牲风格
item.description:
When a South Carolina couple hired designer Lilse McKenna to turn their home's underused screened-in porch into real living space, the brief was clear: A super-practical, year-round family room that doesn't sacrifice style https://t.co/9DocVx0UEP https://t.co/9DocVx0UEP

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 从月光酒到葡萄酒庄更年长、更富裕的人口涌入阿巴拉契亚，把一个乡村地区变成了热闹的退休天堂。
item.description:
From moonshine to wineries. An older, wealthier population is flooding into Appalachia, transforming a rustic region into a bustling retirement haven. https://t.co/K1Ntviz9dU

item.title: Keurig 将在推出新型咖啡冲煮器的同时，首次推出不含塑料和铝的咖啡豆荚，这可能是该公司首个可堆肥的一次性豆荚。

item.title: 在南安普顿，大西洋唱片公司联合创始人阿赫梅特-埃特根（Ahmet Ertegun）建造的约 1.1 万平方英尺的海滨住宅即将以 5200 万美元的价格上市。
item.description:
In Southampton, a roughly 11,000-square-foot waterfront home built by Atlantic Records co-founder Ahmet Ertegun is coming on the market for $52 million https://t.co/ApGGVCLrTH https://t.co/ApGGVCLrTH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：随着华盛顿推迟对基辅的援助，当地的局势正在恶化。威廉-加尔斯顿（William Galston）写道，乌克兰军队在崩溃之前只能如此屈服。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: As Washington delays aid to Kyiv, the situation on the ground is deteriorating. Ukrainian forces can bend only so much before they break, writes William Galston. https://t.co/CvYcKjznuH https://t.co/CvYcKjznuH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.description:
When a South Carolina couple hired designer Lilse McKenna to turn their home's underused screened-in porch into real living space, the brief was clear: A super-practical, year-round family room that doesn't sacrifice style https://t.co/vuRuxP5kKq https://t.co/vuRuxP5kKq

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：SAT 考试是在揭示当前能力的差异，而不是制造这些差异。@jasonrileywsj 写道，取消考试并不会让这些差异消失。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The SAT is revealing differences in current ability, not creating those differences. And scrapping the tests wouldn’t make those differences disappear, writes @jasonrileywsj. https://t.co/tVDMFRJz3Q https://t.co/tVDMFRJz3Q

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：联邦政府向州和地方政府提供的资金超过了其国防开支。这是一个和平时期福利国家的优先事项，而不是一个在充满敌人的世界里认真保卫自己的国家的优先事项。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The federal government gives more cash to state and local governments than it spends on its own defense. These are the priorities of a peacetime welfare state, not a nation serious about defending itself in a world of enemies. https://t.co/ULQmi9LzoE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行罕见地对货币政策的内部运作方式进行了调整，这一变化虽然是技术性的，但对经济和投资者都具有重要意义
item.description:
The European Central Bank unveiled a rare makeover to the inner workings of monetary policy, in a change that is technical but consequential for the economy and investors https://t.co/8N49FEvBgD https://t.co/8N49FEvBgD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 唐-莱蒙（Don Lemon）说，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）取消了与 X 公司的交易，因为马斯克对前 CNN 主持人对他的采访不满意
item.description:
Don Lemon says Elon Musk canceled his deal with X because Musk wasn’t happy with an interview the former CNN host did with him https://t.co/RR28cej3LX https://t.co/RR28cej3LX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一项新的研究表明，如果一家公司受到网络攻击，其整个供应链都会付出代价
item.description:
If a company is hit by a cyberattack, its whole supply chain pays a price, according to a new study https://t.co/gsTvVa5Tz5 https://t.co/gsTvVa5Tz5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 尽管医疗保健类股票在大选年表现不佳，但它们迎来了 2017 年以来的最佳开局
item.description:

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：中东和其他地区的许多阿拉伯政治家在批评哈马斯 10 月 7 日对以色列的袭击时都模棱两可。曼苏尔-阿巴斯却不是这样，@tunkuv 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Many Arab politicians in the Middle East and beyond were equivocal in criticizing Hamas’s Oct. 7 attack on Israel. Not Mansour Abbas, writes @tunkuv. https://t.co/oAhZ3xwPA8 https://t.co/oAhZ3xwPA8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在不到两周的时间里第二次公开警告说，在本周末的总统选举之前，有可能与西方国家发生核对抗
item.description:
Vladimir Putin warned publicly for the second time in less than two weeks of the possibility of nuclear confrontation with the West ahead of presidential elections this weekend https://t.co/IF0p7hmuxH https://t.co/IF0p7hmuxH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在财务实力得分排名前 250 位的管理公司中，皇家加勒比公司的得分涨幅最大，其次是切尼尔能源公司和大都会人寿保险公司。

item.title: 尼尔-扬说，他将允许自己的音乐重新回到 Spotify，两年前，这位歌手曾因反对流媒体服务与播客乔-罗根（Joe Rogan）的关系而撤下了自己的音乐目录。
item.description:
Neil Young said he will allow his music to return to Spotify, two years after the singer pulled his catalog over opposition to the streaming service’s relationship with podcaster Joe Rogan https://t.co/quMcLG7ztP https://t.co/quMcLG7ztP

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州一名法官在亚特兰大驳回了针对前总统唐纳德-特朗普和五名共同被告的选举干扰起诉书中的六项指控，但更广泛的案件仍在审理中。
item.description:
A Georgia judge dismissed six counts in the election-interference indictment against former President Donald Trump and five co-defendants in Atlanta, though the broader case is still intact https://t.co/MsKHo6LAZ6 https://t.co/MsKHo6LAZ6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息众议院批准了一项禁止 TikTok 在美国运营或强制出售的法案。该法案在参议院的命运尚不明朗。
item.description:
Breaking: The House approved a bill that would ban TikTok from operating in the U.S. or force a sale. The measure's fate in the Senate is uncertain. https://t.co/EqeHr6Stkz https://t.co/EqeHr6Stkz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 以色列为援助物资进入加沙北部开辟了一条新的陆路通道，因为在人们担心饥荒即将来临之际，向被围困的巴勒斯坦飞地运送食品和其他必需品的国际压力与日俱增。
item.description:
Israel opened a new land route for aid to enter northern Gaza as international pressure mounts to deliver food and other essentials to the besieged Palestinian enclave amid concerns of a looming famine https://t.co/KsmEJqUJfY https://t.co/KsmEJqUJfY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024
